name: Ready All, Row! - Prototype
description:
Welcome to Sulis Rowing Club!

You play as Lee, a freshman in high school eager to learn how to row!

But unfortunately, the club is on the brink of shutting down! 

It's now up to you and your four other teammates to grow, compete, and recruit new rowers!

[This is a small prototype for a class]

[THIS WILL BE A MOBILE GAME, so everything is done with a mouse right now on PC/Mac]
